job_purpose: To drive the adoption, integration, and optimization of intelligent automation solutions using Microsoft 365 Business Central, Power Platform, and Dynamics CRM at Fuelfix & Tanks2Go.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and deployment of AI-driven and automated solutions using Microsoft Power Platform, Business Central, and Dynamics CRM.
Collaborate with business units to identify automation opportunities and translate them into scalable solutions.
Integrate AI capabilities such as Copilot and Azure AI services into business workflows.
Establish governance frameworks for automation development, ensuring security, compliance, and performance standards are met.
Develop and deliver training sessions and documentation to upskill internal teams on automation tools and best practices.
Drive user adoption of new tools and processes through effective change management strategies.
Monitor usage and performance metrics to continuously improve solution effectiveness.
required_qualifications: 2+ years experience in designing and implementing solutions using Microsoft PowerApps, Power Automate, and Dynamics 365 CRM.
Experience in Business Central including integration and customization capability.
Familiarity with AI tools such as Microsoft Copilot, Azure AI, or similar platforms.
Ability to manage multiple projects and stakeholders in a fast-paced environment.
preferred_qualifications: Relevant certifications (e.g., Microsoft Power Platform Functional Consultant, Dynamics 365 Fundamentals).
company_details: Fuelfix & Tanks2Go is a leader in fuel management and emissions solutions with a focus on Repairs and Maintenance, Tank Hire and Sales, Fuel Projects, and Facility Management. The company offers a strong and inclusive culture that prioritizes people and safety, providing opportunities for skill development and working with key clients in the hydrocarbons industry.
